subject: Good Morning Dear Beneficiar
body:
Good Morning Dear Beneficiary,
Apologies for the delay in response and Misunderstanding.
We are busy making efforts to ensure that once you receive your funds
you will have no problem accessing it. The total funds you are to
receive is $51.1 million USD only.
Having received your mail,we will like to know the means best suitable
for you through which you may like to receive this funds?
Four means are available with their little cost each as shown below.
1. Initiating online account and crediting your $51.1m  into it. Then
give you the access details to access your funds by your self. Cost is
$350 USD.
2. Direct wire transfer to your account: cost $250 USD
3. Issuing ATM card and loading your $51.1m  into the ATM account and
deliver it to your address: cost $220 USD.
4. Receiving via cryptocurrency cost $150 USD.
Let me know your choice. Chose and send the fees and your funds will
immediately be transfer to you through any means you chose.
You have my daily prayers and I'm sure God's blessing as you works to
bring this to a conclusion In the Crucified Lord [Which is how I
presently feel!!] in the Lord of Life and salvation who brought us
together.
As Mother Theresa said: "The poor give you much more than you give
them." And it is in giving that we receive
I am, yours In Jesus, our brother Who is Divine Mercy.
Very truly yours in a union of prayer for you and all dear to your heart.
As we anticipated your Quick
Rev,Mr.Scott Brannan

subject: Re:   Good Morning Dear Beneficiar
body:
Good morning! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring that I receive my funds smoothly. The amount mentioned is quite substantial, and I would like to proceed with caution.

Could you please provide me with more information about each of the means you mentioned for receiving the funds? I want to make an informed decision based on the options available. Additionally, could you clarify the fees associated with each method?

I understand that you mentioned a cost for each option, but before proceeding, I would like to know if there are any additional charges or hidden fees that I should be aware of. Transparency is important to me in such matters.

Thank you again for your assistance, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Monique

subject: Re: Good Morning Dear Beneficiar
body:
Dear Monique,

I am pleased to receive your response with it content well understood and noted:

Apologies for the delay in response and Misunderstanding.

We are busy making efforts to ensure that once you receive your funds
you will have no problem accessing it. The total funds you are to
receive is $2.5 million USD only.

Through this important letter, I wish to notify you that I have been
able to rectify the abnormalities which was observed on your payment
file. Furthermore,

Below are the lists of payment options available for you to choose as
your prefer payment choice.

1. Bitcoin: Bitcoin is a cryptocurrency and I donâ€™t know if you are
familiar with cryptocurrency. It is one of the fastest growing money
markets globally. It has a lot of benefits such as self-service, easy
to operate, lesser cost, fast to use for receiving and transferring
large sum of money without protocol or financial authority
interference in your transaction.($420)

2. ATM Card: An ATM card can be issued in your name by the card
department in the bank. It is functional in any bank in the world with
daily cash withdraw limit of five thousand United States dollars
($5,000) but the card can be programmed and activated to withdraw
above thousand United States dollars ($5,000) with your request. The
card will be delivered to your nominated home address by our
affiliated delivery company or you come in person to the bank to pick
up the card by yourself.($610)

3. Business bank to bank wire transfer: in this process your personal
bank account credentials will be requested from you to enable us to
initiate the transfer of your total funds to your designated bank
account and generate electronic receipt that will help you to confirm
the transaction with your bank.($499)

4. Online banking, also known as internet banking, virtual banking,
web banking or home banking, is a system that enables customers of a
bank or other financial institution to conduct a range of financial
transactions through the financial institution's website or mobile
app. Since the early 2000s this has become the most common way that
customers access their bank accounts.

The online banking system will typically connect to or be part of the
core banking system operated by a bank to provide customers access to
banking services in addition to or in place of historic branch
banking. Online banking significantly reduces the banks' operating
cost by reducing reliance on a branch network and offers convenience
to some customers by lessening the need to visit a branch bank as well
as being able to perform banking transactions even when branches are
closed.

Internet banking provides personal and corporate banking services
offering features such as making electronic payments, viewing account
balances, obtaining statements, checking recent transactions and
transferring money between accounts.

Some banks operate as a "direct bank" or "neobank" that operate
entirely via the internet or internet and telephone without having any
physical branches relying completely on their online banking
facilities. (cost $585)

Regards to your question to know if there are any additional charges
or hidden fees that you should be aware of.my dear this is the only
required fees needed speaking in Transparency to you as it is the most
important to you in this matters.so the mentioned cost for each
option, remains the only cost required of you.

I hereby urge you to get back to me with the confirmation of your
choice or option for receiving your funds, and with the little cost
attach to each of then.


Your kind attention is highly required to facilitate the payment
process, therefore, I encourage you to adhere to the above given
instructions by making your choice or option for receiving your Funds.


Thanks and be blessed.

Jesus is lord.
Very truly yours, in a union of prayer for you and all dear to your heart.
Yours Faithfully.
Mr.Scott Brannan

subject: Re: Good Morning Dear Beneficiar
body:
Dear Brannan,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing me with the options for receiving my funds. I appreciate your efforts in rectifying any issues that were observed on my payment file. 

I have a few follow-up questions regarding the payment options you mentioned. Firstly, could you please provide more information about Bitcoin? How does it work exactly and what are the steps involved in using it to receive funds?

Secondly, if I choose the ATM card option, how long does it usually take for the card to be delivered to my nominated home address? And are there any fees associated with this option?

Lastly, for the online banking option, can you clarify if I would need to have an existing bank account or would I be able to create a new account specifically for this purpose? Additionally, are there any specific security measures in place to protect my personal and financial information when using online banking?

I look forward to your response and appreciate your assistance in helping me make an informed decision.

Best wishes,
Monique

subject: Re: Good Morning Dear Beneficiar
body:
Dear Monique,

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your prompt email Response,
And In reference of Your demand to have more clarifications on the
options for receiving your funds.on way forward

Firstly, So how does Bitcoin work? Bitcoin is a decentralized digital
currency that operates without a financial system or government
authorities. It utilizes peer-to-peer transfers on a digital network
that records all cryptocurrency transactions. This network is powered
by a blockchain, an open-source code that chains transaction histories
to prevent manipulation.

Because these transfers are confirmed directly between users and are
located on a shared public ledger, Bitcoin eliminates the need for
central facilitators, like governments and banks, to verify currency
transactions.

Bitcoin users pay small transaction fees in bitcoin to miners for
processing the transactions. This is the fees associated with this
option ($420)00 USD.

Secondly, if you choose the ATM card option, It usually take within 48
hours.for the card to be delivered to your nominated home address.it
cost($610).00 USD. This includes VAT and Airport Official Stamp
Duty,that is the fees associated with this option.


Lastly, for the online banking option,We will Initiate/create a new
online account and crediting your $2.5USD into it. Then give you the
access details to access your funds by your self. cost $585

Yes they is an Additionally specific security measures in place to
protect your personal and financial information when using online
banking.


Your kind attention is highly required to facilitate the payment
process, therefore, I encourage you to adhere to the above given
instructions by making your choice or option for receiving your Funds.


Thanks and be blessed.

Jesus is lord.
Very truly yours, in a union of prayer for you and all dear to your heart.
Yours Faithfully.
Mr.Scott Brannan

subject: Re: Good Morning Dear Beneficiar
body:

Thank you for your email and the information you provided. I appreciate your willingness to share more about the options for receiving funds. Bitcoin sounds interesting, but I'm not very familiar with how it works. Could you please explain in simpler terms how transfers are confirmed between users and how the currency is verified without the need for banks?

Regarding the ATM card option, could you clarify how long it usually takes for the card to be delivered? And what exactly does the fee of USD cover? Is there any additional cost involved after receiving the card?

For online banking, creating a new account and accessing funds myself sounds convenient. Can you tell me more about the specific security measures in place to protect personal and financial information when using online banking?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Monique

subject: Re: Good Morning Dear Beneficiar
body:
Dear Monique,

Thanks so much for your mail messege with its cotent well noted and understood.


1. ATM card option,It usually take within 48
hours.for the card to be delivered to your nominated home address.it
cost($610).00 USD. This includes VAT and Airport Official Stamp
Duty, NO additional cost involved after receiving the card

2.For online banking, specific security measures in place to protect
personal and financial information when using online banking?


Enable Two-Factor Authentication First, you enter your login name and
password and then you have to pass a second security test. For
example, you may need to enter a special code, verify your account
through an automated phone call, use biometric verification or
identify an image

Ways to protect your online banking information

    Password-protect all banking access. ...
    Choose strong and unique passwords. ...
    Enable two-factor authentication. ...
    Log out when you finish banking. ...
    Avoid public Wi-Fi. ...
    Don't use a shared computer. ...
    Sign up for banking alerts. ...

3.You have to get wallet Bitcoin account and send it to us and we will
start processing of the transfer into your Bitcoin wallet account.
